dragonborn.***Ability Score Increase***: Your Strength score increases by 2, and your Charisma score increases by 1.
dragonborn.***Age***: Dragonborn live to be ~80 years of age.
dragonborn.***Size***: Dragonborn are well over 6 feet tall, averaging at ~250 pounds.
dragonborn.***Speed***: Dragonborn have a standard walking speed of 30 feet.
dragonborn.***Draconic Ancestry***: Choose one type of dragon from the Draconic Ancestry table. Your breath weapon and damage resistance are determined by the dragon type.

dwarf.***Age***: Dwarves live to be ~350 years of age.
dwarf.***Size***: Dwarves stand between 4-5 feet tall, and average ~150 pounds.
dwarf.***Speed***: Dwarves have a standard walking speed of 25 feet.
dwarf.***Dark Vision***: Dwarves can see ~60 feet in front of them in dim light.
dwarf.***Dwarven Resiliance***: Dwarves have advantage on saving throws against poison, and you have resistance against poison damage.

elf.***Age***: Elves live to be ~750 years of age.
elf.***Size***: Elves can range from under 5 feet to over 6 feet tall.
elf.***Speed***: Elves have a standard walking speed of 30 feet
elf.***Dark Vision***: Elves can see ~60 feet in front of them in dim light.
elf.***Trance***: Instead of sleeping, Elves enter a Trance which lasts for 4 hours and has the same effects as a long rest.

gnome.***Age***: Gnomes live to be between 350-500 years of age.
gnome.***Size***: Gnomes are between 3 and 4 feet tall, and average ~40 pounds.
gnome.***Speed***: Gnomes have a standard walking speed of 25 feet.
gnome.***Dark Vision***: Gnomes can see ~60 feet in front of them in dim light.

half-elf.***Ability Score Increase***: Your Charisma score increases by 2, and two other ability scores of your choice increase by 1.
half-elf.***Age***: Half-Elves live to be ~180 years of age.
half-elf.***Size***: Half Elves range from 5-6 feet tall.
half-elf.***Speed***: Half-Elves have a standard walking speed of 30 feet.
half-elf.***Dark Vision***: Half-Elves can see ~60 feet in front of them in dim light.
half-elf.***Languages***: Common, Elvish, one extra language of choice

halfling.***Age***: Halflings live to ~250 years of age.
halfling.***Size***: Halflings are about 3 feet tall and average ~40 pounds.
halfling.***Speed***: Halflings have a standard walking speed of 25 feet.
halfling.***Lucky***: If you roll a 1 on an attack roll, ability check, or saving throw, you can reroll the die.
halfling.***Halfling Nimbleness***: You can move through the space of any creature that is of a size larger than yours.

half-orc.***Ability Score Increase***: Your Strength score increases by 2, and your Constitution score increases by 1.
half-orc.***Age***: Half-Orcs live to ~75 years of age.
half-orc.***Size***: Half-Orcs range from about 5 to much over 6 feet tall.
half-orc.***Speed***: Half-Orcs have a standard walking speed of 30 feet.
half-orc.***Dark Vision***: Half-Orcs can see ~60 feet in front of them in dim light.
half-orc.***Relentless Endurance***: When you are reduced to 0 hit points but not killed outright, you can drop to 1 hit point instead.
half-orc.***Savage Attacks***: When you score a critical hit with a meelee weapon, you can roll an extra die of damage.

human.***Ability Score Increase***: Your ability scores each increase by 1.
human.***Age***: Humans live to ~90 years of age.
human.***Size***: Humans can range from about 5 feet to well over 6 feet tall.
human.***Speed***: Humans have a standard walking speed of 30 feet.
human.***Languages***: Common, one extra language of choice

tiefling.***Ability Score Increase***: Your Intelligence score increases by 1, and your Charisma score increases by 2.
tiefling.***Age***: Tieflings live to ~90 years of age.
tiefling.***Size***: Tieflings range from about 5-6 feet tall.
tiefling.***Speed***: Tieflings have a standard walking speed of 30 feet.
tiefling.***Dark Vision***: Tieflings can see ~60 feet in front of them in dim light.
tiefling.***Hellish Resistance***: You have resistance to fire damage

leonin.***Ability Score Increase***: Your Constitution score increases by 2, and your Strength score increases by 1.
leonin.***Age***: Leonin live to ~90 years of age.
leonin.***Size***: Leonin are rypically around 6-7 feet tall.
leonin.***Speed***: Leonin have a standard speed of 35 feet.
leonin.***Dark Vision***: Leonin can see ~60 feet in front of them in dim light.

satyr.***Ability Score Increase***: Your Charisma score increases by 2, and your Dexterity score increases by 1.
satyr.***Age***: Satyrs live to ~90 years of age.
satyr.***Speed***: Satyrs have a standard walking speed of 35 feet.

aarakocra.***Ability Score Increase***: Your Dexterity score increases by 2, and your Wisdom score increases by 1.
aarakocra.***Age***: Aarakocra usually live to ~30 years of age.
aarakocra.***Size***: Aarakocra get to about 5 feet tall.
aarakocra.***Speed***: Aarakocra have a standard walking speed of 25 feet, and a flying speed of 50 feet.
aarakocra.***Flight***: You have the ability to fly at a speed of 50 feet.

genasi.***Age***: Genasi live to up to 120 years of age.
genasi.***Speed***: Genasi have a standard walking speed of 30 feet.

goliath.***Ability Score Increase***: Your Strength score increases by 2, and your Constitution score increases by 1.
goliath.***Age***: Goliath live to ~90 years of age.
goliath.***Size***: Goliath range between 7-8 feet tall, and average ~280-340 pounds.
goliath.***Speed***: Goliath have a standard walking speed of 30 feet.
goliath.***Mountain Born***: You have resistance to cold damage, and are acclimated to heights over 20,000 feet.

aasimar.***Age***: Aasimar can live anywhere between 90-160 years of life.
aasimar.***Size***: Aasimar can range from 5-6 feet tall.
aasimar.***Speed***: Aasimar have a standard walking speed of 30 feet.
aasimar.***Dark Vision***: Aasimar can see ~60 feet in front of them in dim light.
aasimar.***Healing Hands***: As an action, you can touch a creature and cause it to regain a number of hit points equal to your level.

bugbear.***Ability Score Increase***: Your Strength score increases by 2, and your Dexterity score increses by 1.
bugbear.***Age***: Bugbears live up to 80 years of age.
bugbear.***Size***: Bugbears get to between 6 and 8 feet tall and average at ~250-350 pounds.
bugbear.***Speed***: Bugbears have a standard walking speed of 30 feet.
bugbear.***Dark Vision***: Bugbears can see ~60 feet in front of them in dim light.
bugbear.***Long Limbed***: When you make a melee attack on your turn, your reach for it is 5 feet greater than normal.

firbolg.***Ability Score Increase***: Your Wisdom score increases by 2, and your Strength score increases by 1.
firbolg.***Age***: Firbolg can live up to 500 years of age.
firbolg.***Size***: Firbolg can grow up to be between 7 and 8 feet tall and average at ~240-300 pounds.
firbolg.***Speed***: Firbolg have a standard walking speed of 30 feet.
firbolg.***Hidden Step***: As a bonus action, you can magically turn invisible until the start of your next turn or until you attack, make a damage roll, or force someone to make a saving throw.

goblin.***Ability Score Increase***: Your Dexterity score increases by 2, and your Constitution score increases by 1.
goblin.***Age***: Golbins can live up to 60 years of age.
goblin.***Size***: Goblins are typically between 3-4 feet tall. They average at about 40-80 pounds.
goblin.***Speed***: Goblins have a standard walking speed of 30 feet.
goblin.***Dark Vision***: Goblins can see ~60 feet in front of them in dim light.

hobgoblin.***Ability Score Increase***: Your Constitution score increases by 2, and your Intelligence score increases by 1.
hobgoblin.***Age***: Hobgoblins average about 90 years of age.
hobgoblin.***Size***: Hobgoblins usually get to about 5-6 feet tall and are typically around 150-200 pounds.
hobgoblin.***Speed***: Hobgoblins have a standard walking speed of 30 feet.
hobgoblin.***Dark Vision***: Hobgoblins can see ~60 feet in front of them in dim light.

kenku.***Ability Score Increase***: Your Dexterity score increases by 2, and your Wisdom score increases by 1.
kenku.***Age***: Kenku generally live to ~60 years of age.
kenku.***Size***: Kenku are around 5 feet tall and weiggh between 90 and 120 pounds.
kenku.***Speed***: Kenku have a standard walking speed of 30 feet.
kenku.***Expert Forgery***: You can duplicate other creatures' handwriting and craftwork.
kenku.***Mimicry***: You can mimic sounds you have heard, including voices. You can only speak using this trait.

kobold.***Age***: KObolds can live to ~120 years, but rarely do so.
kobold.***Size***: Kobolds average around 2-3 feet tall, and weight between 25-35 pounds.
kobold.***Speed***: Kobolds have a standard walking speed of 30 feet.
kobold.***Dark Vision***: Kobolds can see ~60 feet in front of them in dim light.
kobold.***Grovel, Cower, and Beg***: As an action on your turn, you can cower pathetically to distract nearby foes. Until the end of your next turn, your allies gain advantage on attack rolls against enemies within 10 feet of you that you can see.
kobold.***Pack Tactics***: You have advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of your allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

lizardfolk.***Ability Score Increase***: Your Constitution score increases by 2, and your Wisdom score increases by 1.
lizardfolk.***Age***: Lizardfolk generally live up to 60 years of age.
lizardfolk.***Speed***: Lizardfolk have a standard walking or swimming speed of 30 feet.
lizardfolk.***Cunning Artisan***: As part of a short rest, you can harvest bone and hide from a slain beast, construct, dragon, monstrosity, or plant creature of size small or larger to create one of the following items: a shield, a club, a javelin, or 1d4 darts or blowgun needles.
lizardfolk.***Hold Breath***: You can hold your breath for up to 15 minutes at a time.

orc.***Ability Score Increase***: Your Strength score increases by 2, and your Constitution score increases by 1.
orc.***Age***: Orcs can live up to 50 years of age.
orc.***Size***: Orcs are generally at least 6 feet tall, and average ~230-280 pounds.
orc.***Speed***: Orcs have a standard walking speed of 30 feet.
orc.***Dark Vision***: Orcs can see ~60 feet in front of them in dim light.

tabaxi.***Ability Score Increase***: Your Dexterity score increases by 2, and your Charisma score increases by 1.
tabaxi.***Age***: Tabaxi live to ~90 years of age.
tabaxi.***Size***: Tabaxi are generally around 5-6 feet tall.
tabaxi.***Speed***: Tabaxi have a standard walking speed of 30 feet, and a climbing speed of 20 feet.
tabaxi.***Dark Vision***: Tabaxi can see ~60 feet in front of them in dim light.
tabaxi.***Feline Agility***: Your reflexes and agility allow you to move with a burst of speed. When you move on your turn in combat, you can double your speed until the end of the turn.
tabaxi.***Cat's Claws***: Because of your claws, you have a climbing speed of 20 feet. In addition, your claws are natural weapons, which you can use to make unarmed strikes.
tabaxi.***Languages***: Common, one extra language of choice

triton.***Ability Score Increase***: Your Strength score will increase by 1, your Constitution score will increase by 1, and your Charisma score will increase by 1.
triton.***Age***: Tritons can live up to 200 years old.
triton.***Speed***: Tritons have a standard walking speed of 30 feet, and a swimming speed of 30 feet.
triton.***Amphibious***: You can breathe air and water.
triton.***Dark Vision***: Tritons can see ~60 feet in front of them in dim light.
triton.***Guardians of the Depths***: Adapted to even the most extreme ocean depths, you have resistance to cold damage.

yuan-ti pureblood.***Ability Score Increase***: Your Charisma score increases by 2, and your Intelligence score increases by 1.
yuan-ti pureblood.***Age***: Yuan-ti Pureblood live to ~90 years of age.
yuan-ti pureblood.***Size***: Yuan-ti Pureblood usually average between 5 and 6 feet tall.
yuan-ti pureblood.***Speed***: Yuan-ti Pureblood have an average walking speed of 30 feet.
yuan-ti pureblood.***Dark Vision***: Yuan-ti Pureblood can see ~60 feet in front of them in dim light.
yuan-ti pureblood.***Magic Resistance***: You have advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
yuan-ti pureblood.***Poison Immunity***: You are immune to poison damage and the poisoned condition.

changeling.***Ability Score Increase***: Your Charisma score increases by 1, and one score of your choice increases by 1.
changeling.***Speed***: Changelings have a standard walking speed of 30 feet.
changeling.***Shapechanger***: As an action, you can change your appearance and your voice. You determine the specifics of the changes, including your coloration, hair length, and sex. You can also adjust your height and weight, but not so much that your size changes.
changeling.***Languages***: Common, two extra languages of choice

kalashtar.***Ability Score Increase***: Your Wisdom score increases by 2, and your Charisma score increases by 1.
kalashtar.***Age***: Kalashtar live to be ~90 years old.
kalashtar.***Size***: Kalashtar are usually around 5-6 feet tall.
kalashtar.***Speed***: Kalashtar have a standard walking speed of 30 feet.
kalashtar.***Mental Discipline***: You have resistance to psychic damage.
kalashtar.***Mind Link***: You can speak telepathically to any creature you can see, provided the creature is within a number of feet of you equal to 10 times your level.
kalashtar.***Languages***: Common, Quori, one extra language of choice

shifter.***Age***: Shifters rarely live longer than 70 years.
shifter.***Size***: Shifters usually average about 5-6 feet in height.
shifter.***Speed***: Shifters have an average walking speed of 30 feet.
shifter.***Dark Vision***: Shifters can see ~60 feet in front of them in dim light.
shifter.***Shifting***: As a bonus action, you can assume a more bestial appearance. This transformation lasts for 1 minute, until you die, or until you revert to your normal appearance as a bonus action.

warforged.***Ability Score Increase***: Your Constitution score increases by 2, and one score of your choice increases by 1.
warforged.***Age***: Average lifespan unknown, a typical warforged is between 2 and 30 years old.
warforged.***Size***: Warforged are typically between 5-6 feet tall.
warforged.***Speed***: Warforged have a standard walking speed of 30 feet.
warforged.***Sentry's Rest***: When you take a long rest, you must spend at least six hours in an inactive, motionless state, rather than sleeping. In this state, you appear inert, but it doesn't render you unconscious, and you can see and hear as normal.
warforged.***Languages***: Common, one extra language of choice

gith.***Size***: Most Gith are around 6 feet in height.
gith.***Speed***: Gith have a standard walking speed of 30 feet.

centaur.***Ability Score Increase***: Your Strength score increases by 2, and your Wisdom score increases by 1.
centaur.***Age***: Centaurs usually live to ~90 years old.
centaur.***Size***: Centaurs are usually around 7-8 feet tall, and the horse part about 4 feet long.
centaur.***Speed***: Centaurs have a standard walking speed of 40 feet.
centaur.***Charge***: If you move at least 30 feet straight toward a target and then hit it with a melee weapon attack on the same turn, you can immediately follow that attack with a bonus action, making one attack against the target with your hooves.

loxodon.***Ability Score Increase***: Your Constitution score increases by 2, and your Wisdom score increases by 1.
loxodon.***Age***: Loxodons tend to live around 450 years.
loxodon.***Size***: Loxodons stand between 7 and 8 feet tall, and average between 300 and 400 pounds.
loxodon.***Speed***: Loxodons have a standard walking speed of 30 feet.
loxodon.***Trunk***: You can grasp things with your trunk, and you can use it as a snorkel. It has a reach of 5 feet, and it can lift a number of pounds equal to five times your Strength score.

minotaur.***Ability Score Increase***: Your Strength score increases by 2, and your Constitution score increases by 1.
minotaur.***Age***: Minotaurs can live up to 150 years old.
minotaur.***Size***: Minotaurs average around 6 feet in height.
minotaur.***Speed***: Minotaurs have a standard walking speed of 30 feet.
minotaur.***Horns***: Your horns are natural melee weapons, which you can use to make unarmed strikes.
minotaur.***Goring Rush***: Immediately after you use the Dash action on your turn and move at least 20 feet, you can make one melee attack with your horns as a bonus action.
minotaur.***Hammering Horns***: Immediately after you hit a creature with a melee attack as part of the Attack action on your turn, you can use a bonus action to attempt to shove that target with your horns.

simic hybrid.***Ability Score Increase***: Your Constitution score increases by 2, and one score of your choice increases by 1.
simic hybrid.***Age***: Simic Hybrids start out their life as humans, elves, or vedalken. Current lifespan is unknown.
simic hybrid.***Size***: Simic Hybrids average around 5-6 feet in height.
simic hybrid.***Speed***: Simic Hybrids have a standard walking speed of 30 feet.
simic hybrid.***Dark Vision***: Simic Hybrids can see ~60 feet in front of them in dim light.
simic hybrid.***Underwater Adaptation***: You can breathe air and water, and you have a swimming speed equal to your walking speed.
simic hybrid.***Manta Glide***: You have ray-like fins that you can use as wings to slow your fall or allow you to glide.
simic hybrid.***Languages***: Common, your choice between Elvish or Vedalken.

vedalken.***Ability Score Increase***: Your Intelligence score increases by 2, and your Wisdom score increases by 1.
vedalken.***Age***: Vedalken usually live around 350 years, but some live past 500.
vedalken.***Size***: Vedalken usually are between 6 and 6.5 feet tall.
vedalken.***Speed***: Vedalken have a standard walking speed of 30 feet.
vedalken.***Partially Amphibious***: By absorbing oxygen through your skin, you can breathe underwater for up to 1 hour.
vedalken.***Languages***: Common, Vedalken, one extra language of choice

verdan.***Ability Score Increase***: Your Charisma score increases by 2, and your Constitution score increases by 1.
verdan.***Age***: Verdan are speculated to live to ~200, but nobody knows for sure.
verdan.***Size***: VErdan are typically around 3-6 feet tall.
verdan.***Speed***: Verdan have a standard walking speed of 30 feet.
verdan.***Limited Telepathy***: You can telepathically speak to any creature you can see within 30 feet of you.
verdan.***Black Blood Healing***: When you roll a 1 or 2 on any Hit Die you spend at the end of a short rest, you can reroll the die and must use the new roll.
verdan.***Languages***: Common, Goblin, one extra language of choice
